nodes.text: Bogden 3, or Bogden Three, was one of the twenty moons of Bogden, a planet located in the Inner Rim.

Just before the Clone Wars, the Jedi Order built a small chapter house on Bogden 3 to accommodate Jedi younglings awaiting to be trained on Coruscant. K'Kruhk and Sian Jeisel stopped there after the Siege of Saleucami when their Theta-class T-2c shuttle was damaged en route to Mygeeto. At this point, Order 66 was given to their accompanying clone troopers, and Sian was killed while buying time for K'Kruhk and a group of Jedi younglings from the Soaring Hawkbat Clan to escape.
